mapper.insert: insert into noshowvaccine.member (username, password, name, birth, gender, telephone, noshow, shot, vaccination_date, last_update) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{telephone}, '0', 0, null, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE noshowvaccine.member SET password = #{password}, telephone = #{telephone}, last_update = now() WHERE id=#{id}
